articles.title: The best Labor Day sales our editors found at Amazon, Walmart and more — save up to 75% - yahoo.com
articles.description: Our team of deal-hunting pros found everything from AirPods at a near record-low price to the new Bissell Little Green Mini on rare markdown.

articles.title: Powerball jackpot jumps to an estimated $1.1 billion after no winning tickets in Saturday's drawing - CBS News
articles.description: Monday's estimated $1.1. billion drawing will be the fifth-largest in Powerball history.

articles.title: Lisa Cook standing up for the Federal Reserve is a ploy to turn a blind eye from her mortgage scandal - New York Post
articles.description: Fed Governor Lisa Cook is standing up to Donald Trump, suing to keep her job because she says the president is trumping up a scandal and she’s fighting for Fed independence.

articles.title: Amtrak's new high-speed Acela train a gamechanger for Northeast travelers - CBS News
articles.description: Amtrak's NextGen Acela high-speed trains are now racing passengers between Boston, New York and Washington, D.C., hitting top speeds of 160 miles per hour.

articles.title: Verizon service restored in Bay Area, other cities nationwide after major outage - San Francisco Chronicle
articles.description: Verizon customers nationwide regained service Saturday evening after a major outage blamed on a “software issue.”

articles.title: Mortgage Refinancing Starts to Thaw as Rates Trend Down - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: It has been a frustrating wait for people who bought homes in the past few years, when mortgage rates have been high

articles.title: What is the Federal Reserve Endgame? - The Overshoot
articles.description: Suborning the central bank will obviously have implications for monetary policy. But the power that could be exercised via regulatory and supervisory control of the banking system is even greater.

articles.title: 'No question Bitcoin hits $1M' — Eric Trump at BTC Asia 2025 - Cointelegraph
articles.description: Eric Trump takes the stage at the Bitcoin Asia 2025 conference in Hong Kong and predicts Bitcoin will hit $1 million in the next several years.

articles.title: Six months into tariffs, businesses have no idea how to price anything - Hacker News
Rural America is suffering an economic crisis as crop prices plunge - Fortune
articles.description: "Prices continue to drop and at the same time our farmers are paying significantly more for inputs and equipment."

articles.title: Tame US Job Growth Expected in Approach to Fed Meeting - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Employers in the US showed little enthusiasm to take on workers during August, and the unemployment rate probably ticked up to an almost four-year high, adding to evidence of a more subdued labor market.

articles.title: Spirit Airlines files for bankruptcy again but vows to keep flying - KSL.com
articles.description: Budget carrier Spirit Airlines said Friday that it has filed for fresh bankruptcy protection months after emerging from a Chapter 11 reorganization.

articles.title: Tesla lawyers ask judge to throw out $243 million verdict, saying mention of Elon Musk misled the jury - Fortune
articles.description: Musk had taken a big chance by allowing the case to go to trial at a pivotal moment for his electric car company.

articles.title: California crowed that it 'finally beat big oil' 2 years ago. Regulators just halted the landmark penalty payments - Fortune
articles.description: Energy regulators put the brakes on plans requiring oil firms to pay if their profits climb too high after two refineries announced plans to close.

articles.title: Flight 5971: 2 injured when United Express flight by SkyWest from Aspen, CO to Houston hits turbulence, diverts to Austin, Texas - ABC7 Los Angeles
articles.description: "We're going to need a stretcher, and there is bleeding as well. SkyWest 5971," a pilot said.

articles.title: Malibu’s Beloved Reel Inn, Destroyed by L.A. Fires, Is Told It Can’t Rebuild - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: The Leonards got word they can’t renew lease for 36-year-old fish shack. “It would be a Herculean task.”

articles.title: Time to consider the community cost of offshore wind in Maryland - Maryland Matters
articles.description: Much has been made of the benefits of offshore wind, but it's time to talk about the impact of these industrial-sized projects on fisheries, tourism and local communities that will live within sight of them, writes Kevin Gibbs of StopOffshoreWind.org.

articles.title: It’s One of the Worst Things Nixon Did. Trump Is Copying It. - Slate
articles.description: Thanks to Donald, the most dangerous file in Washington is … your mortgage application?

articles.title: Visitors dropped for a 6th straight month in Las Vegas as head of tourism insists Sin City isn't dead - CBS News
articles.description: Las Vegas saw a 12% decline in visitors compared to a year ago, hosting about 3.1 million people, according to LVCVA data.
